about_the_game:
The Dollmaker is a psychological survival puzzle game where you are trapped in an abandoned hospital, forced to undergo a horrifying test by a sadistic inventor known only as The Dollmaker. He has chosen you as his next experiment, seeking to determine if you are "suitable for Enhancement" — a grotesque transformation into one of his twisted creations.

As you navigate the hospital's decaying halls, you must solve devious puzzles and manipulate the environment to unlock your escape. But you're not alone. The Dollmaker's creations — grotesque, mechanical dolls that were once human — will stop at nothing to keep you from escaping. These relentless horrors lurk around every corner, each one more dangerous and cunning than the last.

Each puzzle you solve brings you closer to the truth about the Dollmaker’s dark obsession, but also deeper into his sadistic game. Will you be able to outsmart his traps and the Creations hunting you? Can you keep your sanity intact as you unravel the mysteries of the Dollmaker’s twisted experiments?

The clock is ticking, and every choice you make will determine whether you escape the Dollmaker’s labyrinth — or become just another piece of his collection.

Features:

  • Solve intricate, environment-based puzzles that challenge your wits and resilience.

  • Escape deadly traps set by the Dollmaker to test your ability to survive.

  • Encounter terrifying creations — the Dollmaker’s twisted mechanical dolls — who will relentlessly pursue you.

  • Use Your Knowledge and instinct in order to combat and fight off The Dollmakers Horrific Creations

  • Uncover the dark secrets of the Dollmaker’s experiments and his horrific quest for "Enhancement."

  • A chilling atmosphere filled with suspense, mystery, and psychological tension.

Will you survive the Dollmaker, or will you become his next creation?

name: The DollMaker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1660 Super
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This will change to be more accurate upon release
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Trapped in an abandoned hospital, you must survive the Dollmaker’s twisted test to escape. Solve devious puzzles and outsmart his horrific creations, or risk becoming one of his soulless, Creatures. Will you survive the trial, or will you become his next experiment?
